img_above_text:
When fighting the Commander Beetle, watch out for its two sweeping swords that create a delayed shockwave in the air that slices you moments after the attack is complete. The Commander Beetle also shoots a volley of projectiles from its head that deal poison damage. Antimiasma Powder could come in handy in this fight.
## Commander Beetle Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Blade Flurry**
* Equipped Effect: Moderately increases Poison Resistance.

img_summary: The image showcases the "Commander Beetle Spirit" in the equipment menu of a video game. This spirit has the ability "Blade Flurry," which allows players to take the form of the Commander Beetle, spinning twin blades to deal area damage to nearby foes. Its equipped effect moderately increases Poison Resistance. The interface also includes a demo preview of the ability in action and options to equip or sort spirits.
